column5: Of all the benefits that OFC has to offer, meeting new people that I'd never have met otherwise has to be it's greatest asset. I've met such fantastic people such as TJ, Ron, Spiel and Jeff (team empty pockets). But I just might be hitting the jackpot this weekend as far as meeting fellow OFC'ers goes. There's a very good chance that I'll be hooking up with both Moosebunk and Irishfield. Barring a disaster, I will be fishing with Moosebunk, as he is already in the area. I talked to him at noon today and the fish are biting. He's already smashed his personal best Brook Trout record, and landed a couple of mid 40 inch Pike as well. Wayne called tonight and he's ready to fly out tomorrow morning. I'm not sure if I can get away too early tomorrow, but I'll be there one way or another tomorrow. This is going to be a very special weekend for me. I really can't wait.
Better smudge to the Trout Spirits tonight! Heap big fish medicine!

Would love to meet Drew one day, but I can vouch for Wayne...a class act all the way!  Sounds like you're going to have a blast....cant wait for the report....with all those amazing scenery shots and hopefully lots of pics of you guys holding fish.  Have fun!
pack an extra memory stick & batteries Dan
I was hoping to hook up with you as well, but my bro-in-law flew me out instead. Sigh...It'll happen!
Congrats Dan, hooking up with Bunk you can't go wrong and Wayne....well that's another story. Looks like I should have stayed up there and headed west
Oh man, sounds like its going to be a fantastic time.  Have a blast and take lots of pics for us Dan  Joey

I talked to Wayne on the phone yesterday Dan and he was really looking forward to the trip. He was praying that the weather held so that he could get in the air. He was a little concerned about the co-ordinates that you gave him though....
Have a great time Dan and regards to the boys.
Good luck Dan. I thought it would be just a matter of time before they started hooking into some acton. I will probably see you guys Sunday. Alan
Have a great time Dan, this has the making of one of the most sought after reports of the year. Moosebunk, Wayne and Dan fishing together!!!  Cheers, 1leg
Sounds like an awesome trip and great company ...  Can't wait to read the post  Have fun  Cheers Jen
Man, that sounds like one of the best outings of the year! Certainly looking forward to that one. You guys have a great time....PLUS, all 4 are excellent photographers.  WOOOOOOOHOOOOOOOOO!
Just don't let Wayne hold the cameras! HH
